sources.name: DriverShiftTrips
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		driverid as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DriverShiftTrips

sources.name: source
sources.script:
source(output(
		driverid as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(mapColumn(
		driverid = source@driverid,
		Prop_1,
		Prop_2 = source@Prop_2,
		Prop_3 = source@Prop_3,
		Prop_4,
		Prop_5,
		Prop_6,
		phone,
		Prop_0
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
source, DriverShiftTrips join(source@driverid == DriverShiftTrips@driverid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
